short_summary: Fibre Rope Assy, 30 Leices of fibre rope, documentation varies
description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENTNote: Due to the impacts to the COVID-19 Pandemic, reduced business hours and limited staff available at the specified bid receiving Unit, on the front page of the Bid Solicitation document, bidders are strongly encouraged to transmit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service instead of any of the other methods of bid delivery usually available.The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at CAAWC Trenton by July 1st, 2023Item 1, GSIN: 4020, NSN: 01-337-3185, Fibre Rope Assy, Single legPart No.: 0086-CSI-25K, NCAGE: 57282 (Ocean Products)Quantity: 15, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CAAWC Trenton.Item 2, GSIN: 4020 , NSN: 01-365-3115, Fibre rope Assy, Single LegPart No.: 0085-CSI-0967: Quantity: 15,Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CAAWC Trenton.Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/models. The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

**Tender Title:** Fibre Rope Assemblies
**Classification Code:** N4020 (Fibre Rope, Cordage, and Twine)

**Contracting Entity:**
Department of National Defence
101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A0K2, Canada

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Selection Criteria:** Not specified

**Objective:** The Department of National Defence is seeking bids for the delivery of fibre rope assemblies to CAAWC Trenton by July 1st, 2023.

**Items:** The required items include:

* Fibre Rope Assemblies, Single-leg (1) - Part No.: 0086-CSI-25K, NCAGE: 57282 (Ocean Products)
* Fibre Rope Assemblies, Single-leg (2) - Part No.: 0086-CSI-11K, NCAGE: 57282 (Ocean Products)

**Specifications:**

1. Item 1: 15 pieces, EA unit of issue
2. Item 2: 15 pieces, AY unit of issue

**Supporting Documents:**

* Bid Solicitation documents in English and French are available online at: [insert link]
* Bidders are encouraged to submit bids electronically using the epost Connect service.

**Contact Information:**

* Debbie Bergeron
* Email: [debbie.bergeron@forces.gc.ca](mailto:debbie.bergeron@forces.gc.ca)

**Key Dates:**

* Tender closing date: April 25, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* Expected contract start date: Not specified
* Expected contract end date: Not specified

**Note:**

* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
